title:
Good afternoon,

My father served on the Liberty Ship SS George E. Badger during WW2. I am desperately searching for a photo of the Badger. Could you please help?

Thanks in advance!
text:
We don't have a photo in our own archives of the George E. Badger, but a Google search brought me to a page with several pictures: http://www.navsource.org/archives/10/04/04033.htm



Hope that helps.
